basic.description:
A detailed study of selected novels from 20th-century French authors until 1945. Beauvoir, Camus, Céline, Cocteau, Colette, Gide, Proust, Sartre. Travaux pratiques include essays and tests.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Le roman français du 20e siècle

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite       (FREN230 and FREN241) or FREN221 or (FREN212 and FREN220).
Exclusion     No more than 3.0 units from FREN324 or FREN424
